SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AuthCampCommitteeService
The AuthStudentService class extends AuthService and provides the login functionality for students.
AuthController
AuthController class provides utility methods for managing user authentication within the application.
AuthService
The AuthService class is an abstract class that implements the IAuthService interface.
AuthStaffService
The AuthStaffService class extends AuthService and provides the login functionality for staff members.
AuthStore
The AuthStore class provides utility methods for managing the current authenticated user within the application.
AuthStudentService
The AuthStudentService class extends AuthService and provides the login functionality for students.
AuthView
The AuthView class implements the IMenuView interface and is responsible for displaying the authentication menu with options for staff login, student login, camp committee login, and quitting the application.
Camp
Represents a Camp with associated information and visibility status.
CampCommitteeController
The CampCommitteeController class is the main controller for camp committee members.
CampCommitteeService
The CampCommitteeService class implements the ICampCommitteeService interface and provides methods for managing committee-related camp services.
CampCommitteeView
The CampCommitteeView class extends StudentView and is responsible for displaying the menu and related views for camp committee members.
CampInformation
Represents CampInformation about a camp.
CampStaffService
The CampStaffService class implements the ICampStaffService interface and provides methods for managing staff-related camp services.
CampStudentService
The CampStudentService class implements the ICampStudentService interface and provides services related to camp registration and management.
CampUpdateService
The CampUpdateService class implements the ICampUpdateService interface and provides services for updating camp information such as its name, dates fields and availability slots.
CampValidationService
The CampValidationService class implements the ICampValidationService interface and provides services for validating camp-related operations.
CAMs
The main class responsible for running the CAMS application.
CsvFileDataService
The CsvFileDataService class implements the IFileDataService interface and provides methods for reading and writing data from/to CSV files.
DataStore
The DataStore class is responsible for storing and managing various types of data related to the application.
Enquiry
Represents an Enquiry in the system, containing information about the sender, responder, message content, and response to the enquiry.
EnquiryResponderService
The EnquiryResponderService class implements the IEnquiryResponderService interface and provides services for handling enquiries to support responding to enquiries related to a camp.
EnquirySenderService
The EnquirySenderService class implements the IEnquirySenderService interface and provides services for retrieving enquiries on varying statuses, creating, editing, and deleting enquiries.
FacultyGroups
Enum representing different faculty group.
FilePathsUtility
The FilePathsUtility class provides utility methods for managing file paths within the application.
IAuthService
The IAuthService interface defines a contract for managing authentication services, such as login and logout.
ICampCommitteeService
The ICampCommitteeService interface defines methods for camp committee camp-related operations.
ICampStaffService
The ICampStaffService interface defines a contract for managing staff-related camp services.
ICampStudentService
The ICampStudentService interface defines methods for retrieving information about camps and managing a student's participation in camps.
ICampUpdateService
The ICampUpdateService interface defines methods for updating camp information.
ICampValidationService
The ICampValidationService interface defines methods for validating criterions for camp-related operations.
IEnquiryResponderService
The IEnquiryResponderService interface defines methods for pertaining to the response to camp-related enquiries.
IEnquirySenderService
The IEnquirySenderService interface defines methods for managing the creation, editing, and deletion of enquiries by a student, as well as retrieving responded, submitted, and draft enquiries.
IFileDataService
The IFileDataService interface defines methods for importing data related to students and staff from specified file paths to the login detail .csv files.
IMenuView
The IMenuView interface defines a contract for displaying main menu options.
InputSelectionUtility
The InputSelectionUtility class provides utility and helper methods for handling input of various forms.
IReportStaffService
The IReportStaffService interface defines methods for staff for generating various reports types related to camps.
IReportStudentService
The IReportStudentService interface defines method(s) for students who are camp committee members for generating report of a camp.
ISuggestionResponderService
The ISuggestionResponderService interface defines methods for responding to suggestions related to a specific camp.
ISuggestionSenderService
The ISuggestionSenderService interface defines methods for managing suggestions sent by a student.
IUserMenuView
The IUserMenuView interface defines a contract for the user main menu options and relevant views it requires.
IUserService
The IUserService interface defines a contract for user services.
MessageStatus
Enum representing different Message Status for Enquiry and Suggestions.
MessageView
The MessageView class provides methods for displaying messages in a boxed format and clearing the scanner buffer.
ReportStaffService
The ReportStaffService class implements the IReportStaffService interface and provides services for generating various reports related to camps, performance, and enquiries.
ReportStudentService
ReportStudentService class for generating student-related reports by camp committee members.
SortUtility
The SortUtility class provides utility methods for sorting lists.
Staff
Represents a Staff member in the system, inheriting from the User class.
StaffController
The StaffController class is the main controller for staff members.
StaffView
StaffView class implements the IUserMenuView interface and is responsible for displaying the staff menu with various options.
Student
Represents a Student in the system, inheriting from the User class.
StudentController
The StudentController class is the main controller for students.
StudentView
The StudentView class implements the IUserMenuView interface and is responsible for displaying the menu and related views for students.
Suggestion
A class that contains the model of a Suggestion made for a camp.
SuggestionResponderService
SuggestionResponderService class for managing and responding to suggestions related to a camp.
SuggestionSenderService
SuggestionSenderService class for managing the sending, editing, and retrieval of suggestions.
User
Represents a User in the system, serving as a base class for specific user types.
UserController
The UserController class provides methods to interact with user accounts and passwords.
UserRole
Enum representing different user role.
UserService
The UserService class implements the IUserService interface and provides functionality related to user management, such as changing passwords.
ViewUtility
The ViewUtility class provides utility methods for displaying onto view menus.
